body_content.explanation: a group of inherited conditions (= ones passed from parent to child) affecting connective tissue (= the tissue that supports the structure of skin, bones, organs, etc.), which may for example allow the skin to stretch too much or the body to bend too easily:
examples: Kendra and her three children were all born with Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome, a hereditary connective tissue disorder.
I have Ehlers-Danlos syndrome and have been in pain for many years.
